results.title: SafeWork NSW to 'hold more employers to account' after $128m boost
results.description: In 2016, Linda Moussa's parter died after a falling at a worksite, with negligence later pinned as a driving factor. After receiving a financial boost from the government, SafeWork NSW is hoping to hold employers accountable for breaking safety laws.

results.title: Sonic Drive-In Opening in Perris Next Year
results.description: The franchise unit will be ready for business early next year.

results.title: Juliet Stevenson paints to switch off
results.description: Juliet Stevenson has revealed the one activity she does to switch off.
